name: Babysitter DemonKicker
description:
Babysitter DemonKicker is a weird mix of babysitting and demon slaying (both are very intense actually). You’ve been hired by a mother to take care of their little hell spawn for a whole week.

In this game, your goal is to keep the baby warm and healthy whilst discarding critters who have nothing but evil intentions. You can keep the baby warm by letting them rest in the furnace or by kicking it around. In fact, kicking the baby is pretty much the only way of defending yourself from these demons, so I hope you didn’t skip leg day.

The mom also hired you to watch out for “special” enemies, who have a rotating star around them. They have special items called “Soul Eggs”, which are super valuable. Make sure to collect as many as you can.

That’s about it.. don’t disappoint the mother!
